amendment.description: To foster investment and private sector market entry.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3882 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3882 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Perdue. (consideration: CR S2499-2500; text: CR S2500) To foster investment and private sector market entry.
